name: Stridy
description: Stridy is a non-profit startup looking to tackle waste management issues such as littering with a tech based solution. Stridy has a mobile application that allows individuals and communities to track their impact on the environment as they collect and dispose of litter. By empowering people across the world to do their part for the environment today, Stridy hopes to build a groundswell of like-minded individuals, engaged with the issue of waste management, at a global level. This is important, because collectively, our individual efforts can culminate in creating a significant positive impact on our world.
